title: Maker Competency Growth Game: 21st-Century Skills Self-Assessment Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Tool Proficiency and Interest in Maker Activities
context.additional_context: Real-time interaction via ZOOM and gamification activities using digital devices (tablet/PC). Teachers provide formative assessment feedback and monitor the learning process.

learning_goals: Learners can self-diagnose 21st-century competencies (creativity, collaboration, critical thinking, digital literacy) during maker activities and establish improvement plans
Learners can maintain motivation by visualizing competency growth as a level-up process using gamification tools
Learners can complete maker projects optimized for their learning pace and style by selecting personalized learning design options

resources: Maker Kit (Paper, Glue, Recycled Materials, etc.)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
